露.definition: dew; syrup; nectar; outdoors (not under cover); to show; to reveal; to betray; to expose

露一手.definition: to show off one's abilities; to exhibit one's skills

露出.definition: to expose; to show; also pr. [lou4 chu1]

露出馬腳.definition: to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature; to give the game away

露天.definition: outdoors; al fresco; in the open

露宿.definition: to sleep outdoors; to spend the night in the open

露富.definition: to show one's wealth; to let one's wealth show

露怯.definition: to display one's ignorance; to make a fool of oneself by an ignorant blunder

露水夫妻.definition: a couple in a short-lived, improper relationship

露白.definition: to reveal one's valuables inadvertently; to betray one's silver (money) when traveling

露臉.definition: to show one's face; to make one's good name; to become successful and well known; to shine

露臺.definition: balcony; patio; flat roof; terrace; deck (unroofed platform); outdoor stage; ancient imperial celestial observation terrace

露苗.definition: (young sprouts) come out; same as 出苗[chu1 miao2]

露醜.definition: to make a fool of oneself

露面.definition: to show one's face; to appear (in public)

露頭.definition: to show one's head; to give a sign to show one's presence

露風.definition: to divulge a secret; to leak

露餡.definition: to leak; to expose (sb's secret); to spill the beans; to let the cat out of the bag

露餡兒.definition: erhua variant of 露餡|露馅[lou4 xian4]

露馬腳.definition: to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature; to give the game away

露骨.definition: blatant; unsubtle; frank; (of sex, violence etc) explicit

露點.definition: dew point; (coll.) (of a woman) to expose one of the three areas (nipples and genitals)
